trans-unit.source: Contains information about how bitmap and metafile colors are manipulated during rendering.
trans-unit.target: 包含如何在呈現期間操作點陣圖和中繼檔色彩的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains several color-adjustment settings, including color-adjustment matrices, grayscale-adjustment matrices, gamma-correction values, color-map tables, and color-threshold values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護數個彩色調整設定，包括彩色調整矩陣、 灰階調整矩陣、 gamma 修正值、 色彩對應資料表，以及色彩臨界值。

trans-unit.source: During rendering, colors can be corrected, darkened, lightened, and removed.
trans-unit.target: 在呈現期間，色彩可以更正、 調暗、 淡化，並移除。

trans-unit.source: To apply such manipulations, initialize an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object and pass the path of that <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object (along with the path of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>) to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要套用這類的操作，初始化<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件，並將該路徑<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件 (連同的路徑<xref:System.Drawing.Image>) 至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example takes an image that is all one color (0.2, 0.0, 0.4, 1.0) and doubles the red component adds 0.2 to the red, green, and blue components
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會為所有的一種色彩 （0.2、 0.0、 0.4、 1.0） 的映像和雙精度浮點數的紅色元件加入 0.2 紅色、 綠色和藍色元件

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the original image on the left and the transformed image on the right.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示在右側的原始左側映像，而且已轉換的映像。

trans-unit.source: ![Colors](~/add/media/colortrans1.png "Colors")
trans-unit.target: ![色彩](~/add/media/colortrans1.png "色彩")

trans-unit.source: The code in the following example uses the following steps to perform the recoloring:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例中的程式碼會使用下列步驟執行重新著色，以便：

trans-unit.source: Initialize a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix>物件。

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object and pass the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix> object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件，並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix>物件<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Clears the brush color-remap table of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 清除此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> 物件的筆刷色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify one color-remap table for the default category, a different color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the brush category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定一個預設分類的色彩重新對應表 [點陣圖] 類別中，不同的色彩重新對應表，仍筆刷分類不同的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the brush category, the default settings apply to the brush category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您不指定任何筆刷分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至筆刷分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a default remap table that converts red to green, and you specify a default gamma value of 1.8.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的預設重新對應表轉換為綠色、 紅色，而且您指定預設 1.8 的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable%2A> method, the default remap table (red to green) and the default gamma value (1.8) will not apply to brushes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable%2A>方法，因此預設重新對應表 （紅色綠色） 及預設 gamma 值 (1.8) 不會套用到筆刷。

trans-unit.source: If you later call the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearBrushRemapTable%2A> method, the brush category will not revert to the default remap table; rather, the brush category will have no remap table.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearBrushRemapTable%2A>方法，筆刷分類不會還原成預設值重新對應表; 相反地，筆刷分類會有任何重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the brush category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the brush category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，筆刷分類不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，筆刷分類會有任何 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color key (transparency range).
trans-unit.target: 清除色鍵 (透明度範圍)。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color key (transparency range) for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類的色鍵 (透明度範圍)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify one color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定一個預設分類的色彩索引鍵、 點陣圖分類，不同的色彩索引鍵和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> that specifies the category for which the color key is cleared.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 的元素，指定已經清除色鍵的分類。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color key (transparency range) for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 清除指定分類的色鍵 (透明度範圍)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify one color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定一個預設分類的色彩索引鍵、 點陣圖分類，不同的色彩索引鍵和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a default color key that makes any color with a red component from 200 through 255 transparent, and you specify a default gamma value of 1.8.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定預設色彩索引鍵，讓紅色元件 200 到 255 之間的任何色彩變成透明，而且您指定預設 1.8 的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: If you set the color key of the pen category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A> method, the default color key and the default gamma value will not apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由呼叫設定畫筆分類的色彩索引鍵<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A>方法、 預設的色彩索引鍵和預設 gamma 值不會套用至畫筆。

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the pen color key by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorKey%2A> method, the pen category will not revert to the default color key; rather, the pen category will have no color key.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後藉由呼叫清除的畫筆色彩索引鍵<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorKey%2A>方法，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的色彩索引鍵; 相反地，畫筆分類將沒有色彩索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，畫筆分類會有任何 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 清除彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color-adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類的彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color-adjustment matrix for the default category, a different color-adjustment matrix for the bitmap category, and still a different color-adjustment matrix for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的彩色調整矩陣、 「 點陣圖 」 類別目錄的不同彩色調整矩陣和仍然畫筆分類的不同彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, then the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，然後預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> that specifies the category for which the color-adjustment matrix is cleared.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 的元素，指定已經清除彩色調整矩陣的分類。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color-adjustment matrix for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 清除指定分類的彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color-adjustment matrix for the default category, a different color-adjustment matrix for the bitmap category, and still a different color-adjustment matrix for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的彩色調整矩陣、 「 點陣圖 」 類別目錄的不同彩色調整矩陣和仍然畫筆分類的不同彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, then the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，然後預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a color-adjustment matrix and a gamma value for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的彩色調整矩陣和預設分類的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: If you set a color-adjustment matrix for the pen category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A> method, the default color-adjustment matrix will not apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由呼叫設定畫筆分類的彩色調整矩陣<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A>方法，預設的彩色調整矩陣不會套用至畫筆。

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the pen color-adjustment matrix by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorMatrix%2A> method, the pen category will not revert to the default adjustment matrix; rather, the pen category will have no adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後清除畫筆彩色調整矩陣藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorMatrix%2A>方法，畫筆類別不會還原成預設調整矩陣; 相反地，畫筆分類會有任何調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，畫筆分類會有任何 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: Disables gamma correction.
trans-unit.target: 停用 Gamma 修正。

trans-unit.source: Disables gamma correction for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 停用預設分類的 Gamma 修正。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的 gamma 值，不同的 gamma 值點陣圖分類，然後畫筆分類不同的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> that specifies the category for which gamma correction is disabled.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 的元素，指定已停用 Gamma 修正的分類。

trans-unit.source: Disables gamma correction for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 停用指定分類的 Gamma 修正。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的 gamma 值，不同的 gamma 值點陣圖分類，然後畫筆分類不同的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, then the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，然後預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a gamma value and a color-adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的 gamma 值和預設分類的彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: If you set the gamma value for the pen category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetGamma%2A> method, the default gamma value will not apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由呼叫設定畫筆分類的 gamma 值<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetGamma%2A>方法，預設 gamma 值不會套用至畫筆。

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the pen gamma value by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearGamma%2A> method, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後藉由呼叫清除畫筆 gamma 值<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearGamma%2A>方法，畫筆類別不會還原成預設 gamma 值，而是畫筆分類將沒有 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default color-adjustment matrix; rather, the pen category will have no color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的彩色調整矩陣。相反地，畫筆分類會有任何彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Clears the <see langword="NoOp" /> setting.
trans-unit.target: 清除 <see langword="NoOp" /> 設定。

trans-unit.source: Clears the <see langword="NoOp" /> setting for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類的 <see langword="NoOp" /> 設定。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的 gamma 值，不同的 gamma 值點陣圖分類，然後畫筆分類不同的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: You can disable color adjustment for the default category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫停用預設分類的彩色調整<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Later, you can reinstate color adjustment for the default category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 稍後，您可以藉由呼叫恢復預設分類的彩色調整<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The color adjustment then returns to what was in place before the call to <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 色彩調整然後返回功能已備妥的呼叫之前<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> that specifies the category for which the <see langword="NoOp" /> setting is cleared.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 的元素，指定已清除 <see langword="NoOp" /> 設定的分類。

trans-unit.source: Clears the <see langword="NoOp" /> setting for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 清除指定分類的 <see langword="NoOp" /> 設定。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的 gamma 值，不同的 gamma 值點陣圖分類，然後畫筆分類不同的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: You can disable color adjustment for a certain category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫停用將某個分類的彩色調整<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Later, you can reinstate color adjustment for that category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 稍後，您可以藉由呼叫恢復該分類的彩色調整<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The color adjustment then returns to what was in place before the call to <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 色彩調整然後返回功能已備妥的呼叫之前<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Clears the CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) output channel setting.
trans-unit.target: 清除 CMYK (青色-洋紅-黃色-黑色) 輸出色頻設定。

trans-unit.source: Clears the CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) output channel setting for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類的 CMYK (青色-洋紅-黃色-黑色) 輸出色頻設定。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify an output channel for the default category and a different output channel for the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定在輸出通道的預設分類和點陣圖分類不同的輸出色頻。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您從來沒有指定任何點陣圖分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至點陣圖分類。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> that specifies the category for which the output channel setting is cleared.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 的元素，指定已清除輸出色頻設定的分類。

trans-unit.source: Clears the (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) output channel setting for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 清除指定分類的 (青色-洋紅-黃色-黑色) 輸出色頻設定。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify an output channel for the default category and a different output channel for the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定在輸出通道的預設分類和點陣圖分類不同的輸出色頻。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您從來沒有指定任何點陣圖分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至點陣圖分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify an output channel and an adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定在輸出通道和預設分類調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: If you set the output channel for the bitmap category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> method, the default output channel will not apply to bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由呼叫設定輸出色頻點陣圖分類<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>方法，則預設輸出通道不會套用至點陣圖。

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the bitmap output channel by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannel%2A> method, the bitmap category will not revert to the default output channel; rather, the bitmap category will have no output channel setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後清除點陣圖藉由呼叫的輸出通道<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannel%2A>方法中，點陣圖類別不會還原成預設輸出通道，而是點陣圖分類必須沒有輸出色頻設定。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the bitmap category will not revert to the default color-adjustment matrix; rather, the bitmap category will have no color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，點陣圖類別不會還原成預設的彩色調整矩陣。相反地，點陣圖分類會有任何彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Clears the output channel color profile setting.
trans-unit.target: 清除輸出色頻色彩設定檔的設定。

trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類之輸出色頻色彩設定檔的設定。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 的元素，指定已清除輸出色頻設定檔設定的分類。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify an output channel profile and an adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的輸出通道的設定檔和預設分類調整矩陣。

trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後清除點陣圖輸出通道設定檔，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>方法中，點陣圖類別不會還原成預設輸出通道的設定檔; 相反地，點陣圖分類將任何輸出色頻設定檔設定。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color-remap table.
trans-unit.target: 清除色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color-remap table for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a remap table for the default category, a different remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different remap table for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的重新對應表 [點陣圖] 類別中，不同的重新對應表，仍畫筆分類不同的重新對應表。

trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> that specifies the category for which the remap table is cleared.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 的元素，指定已清除重新對應表的分類。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color-remap table for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 清除指定分類的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a remap table for the default category, a different remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different remap table for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的重新對應表 [點陣圖] 類別中，不同的重新對應表，仍畫筆分類不同的重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, then the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，然後預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a remap table and a gamma value for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的重新對應表及預設分類的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: If you set the remap table for the pen category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A> method, the default remap table will not apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由呼叫設定畫筆分類的重新對應表<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A>方法，預設重新對應表不會套用至畫筆。

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the pen remap table by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearRemapTable%2A> method, the pen category will not revert to the default remap table; rather, the pen category will have no remap table.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後藉由呼叫清除畫筆重新對應表<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearRemapTable%2A>方法，畫筆類別不會還原成預設值重新對應表; 相反地，畫筆分類會有任何重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，畫筆分類會有任何 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the threshold value.
trans-unit.target: 清除閾值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the threshold value for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類的閾值。

trans-unit.source: The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component.
trans-unit.target: 臨界值是從 0 到 1，指定每個色彩元件的截止點的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設臨界值設定為 0.7，並假設您要轉譯色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件 230、 50 和 220，分別是。

trans-unit.source: The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity).
trans-unit.target: 紅色元件 (230) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以紅色元件將會變更到 255 之間 （完整強度）。

trans-unit.source: The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0.
trans-unit.target: 綠色元件 (50) 小於 0.7 x 255, 讓綠色元件將會變更為 0。

trans-unit.source: The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255.
trans-unit.target: 藍色元件 (220) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以藍色元件就會變更為 255。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a different threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的臨界值，不同的臨界值的點陣圖分類，然後畫筆分類的不同臨界值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 的元素，指定已清除閾值的分類。

trans-unit.source: Clears the threshold value for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 清除指定分類的閾值。

trans-unit.source: The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component.
trans-unit.target: 臨界值是從 0 到 1，指定每個色彩元件的截止點的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設臨界值設定為 0.7，並假設您要轉譯色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件 230、 50 和 220，分別是。

trans-unit.source: The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x55, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity).
trans-unit.target: 紅色元件 (230) 大於 0.7x55，所以紅色元件將會變更到 255 之間 （完整強度）。

trans-unit.source: The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0.
trans-unit.target: 綠色元件 (50) 小於 0.7 x 255, 讓綠色元件將會變更為 0。

trans-unit.source: The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255.
trans-unit.target: 藍色元件 (220) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以藍色元件就會變更為 255。

trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a threshold and a gamma value for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的閾值和預設分類的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: If you set the threshold for the pen category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetThreshold%2A> method, the default threshold will not apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由呼叫設定畫筆分類的閾值<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetThreshold%2A>方法，這個方法的預設閾值不會套用至畫筆。

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the pen threshold by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearThreshold%2A> method, the pen category will not revert to the default threshold; rather, the pen category will have no threshold.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後藉由呼叫清除畫筆閾值<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearThreshold%2A>方法，畫筆類別不會還原成預設臨界值; 相反地，畫筆分類會有任何臨界值。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，畫筆分類會有任何 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> 物件的完全相同複本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> object this class creates, cast as an object.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別建立的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> 物件，其轉型為物件。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> 物件使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在記憶體回收開始前，允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette" /> that on input contains the palette to be adjusted, and on output contains the adjusted palette.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette" />，其在輸入時會包含要調整的調色盤，而在輸出時會包含調整過的調色盤。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> that specifies the category whose adjustment settings will be applied to the palette.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 的元素，指定其調整設定將套用至調色盤的分類。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the colors in a palette according to the adjustment settings of a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定分類的調整設定來調整調色盤中的色彩。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color-remap table for the default category, a different color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的色彩重新對應表 [點陣圖] 類別中，不同的色彩重新對應表，仍畫筆分類不同的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.GetAdjustedPalette%2A> method, you can specify the adjustment category that is used to adjust the palette colors.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.GetAdjustedPalette%2A>方法，您可以指定用來調整調色盤色彩的調整類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pass <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType.Bitmap> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.GetAdjustedPalette%2A> method, the adjustment settings of the bitmap category are used to adjust the palette colors.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType.Bitmap>至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.GetAdjustedPalette%2A>方法中，點陣圖類別目錄的設定用來調整調色盤色彩的調整。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-remap table for the brush category.
trans-unit.target: 設定筆刷分類的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: A color-remap table is an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structures.
trans-unit.target: 色彩重新對應表是陣列<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>結構。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structure has two <xref:System.Drawing.Color> objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>結構有兩個<xref:System.Drawing.Color>物件： 其中一個，指定舊的色彩，另一個則指定對應的新色彩。

trans-unit.source: During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 在呈現期間，符合其中一個舊的色彩重新對應表中的任何色彩變更為對應的新色彩。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable%2A> method has the same effect as passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType.Brush> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable%2A>方法已傳遞相同的效果<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType.Brush>至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The specified remap table applies to items in metafiles that are filled with a brush.
trans-unit.target: 指定的重新對應表適用於使用筆刷填滿的中繼檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used only with metafiles.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅只用於中繼檔。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a single-element <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> array that holds red as the old color and green as the new color.
trans-unit.target: 建立單一項目<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>保留舊的色彩為紅色和綠色 做為新的色彩的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Passes this array to a newly created <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 將此陣列傳遞至新建立<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color key (transparency range).
trans-unit.target: 設定色鍵 (透明度範圍)。

trans-unit.source: The low color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 低色鍵值。

trans-unit.source: The high color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 高色鍵值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color key for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定預設分類的色鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the high and low color-key values so that a range of colors can be made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法設定的最高和最低色彩索引鍵的值，使其可以進行透明的色彩範圍。

trans-unit.source: Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 任何色彩，其三個元件 （紅色、 綠色、 藍色） 之間的對應元件的高低的色彩索引鍵的每個進行透明。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的色彩索引鍵、 點陣圖分類，不同的色彩索引鍵和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%28System.Drawing.Color%2CSystem.Drawing.Color%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%28System.Drawing.Color%2CSystem.Drawing.Color%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The low color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 低色鍵值。

trans-unit.source: The high color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 高色鍵值。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> that specifies the category for which the color key is set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 的元素，指定已經設定色鍵的分類。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color key (transparency range) for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定分類的色鍵 (透明度範圍)。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the high and low color-key values so that a range of colors can be made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法設定的最高和最低色彩索引鍵的值，使其可以進行透明的色彩範圍。

trans-unit.source: Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 任何色彩，其三個元件 （紅色、 綠色、 藍色） 之間的對應元件的高低的色彩索引鍵的每個進行透明。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的色彩索引鍵、 點陣圖分類，不同的色彩索引鍵和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的調整設定預設分類的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you set the color key for the pen category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType.Pen> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A> method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由傳遞設定畫筆分類的色彩索引鍵<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType.Pen>至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A>方法，沒有預設值的調整設定將套用到畫筆。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Opens an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that uses the file Circle.bmp and draws it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 開啟<xref:System.Drawing.Image>，會使用檔案 Circle.bmp，並將它繪製到螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object and sets its color key by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件，並設定其色彩索引鍵，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen using the color key of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 將影像繪製至畫面使用的色彩索引鍵<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-adjustment matrix and the grayscale-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 設定彩色調整矩陣和灰階調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The grayscale-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 灰階調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-adjustment matrix and the grayscale-adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定預設分類的彩色調整矩陣和灰階調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify adjustment matrices for the default category, different adjustment matrices for the bitmap category, and still different adjustment matrices for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的調整矩陣、 「 點陣圖 」 類別目錄的不同調整矩陣和畫筆分類不同的調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag.Default?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the `flags` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag.Default?displayProperty=nameWithType>如`flags`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag.Default?displayProperty=nameWithType> specifies that all colors (including grays) are adjusted by the color-adjustment matrix, not the grayscale-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag.Default?displayProperty=nameWithType> 指定會調整的彩色調整矩陣不灰階調整矩陣的所有色彩 （包括灰色）。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the grayscale-adjustment matrix passed to this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 因此，傳遞至這個方法的灰階調整矩陣沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The grayscale-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 灰階調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag" /> that specifies the type of image and color that will be affected by the color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment matrices.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag" /> 的元素，指定將會受到彩色調整和灰階調整矩陣影響之影像和色彩的類型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-adjustment matrix and the grayscale-adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定預設分類的彩色調整矩陣和灰階調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify adjustment matrices for the default category, different adjustment matrices for the bitmap category, and still different adjustment matrices for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的調整矩陣、 「 點陣圖 」 類別目錄的不同調整矩陣和畫筆分類不同的調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: The color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The grayscale-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 灰階調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag" /> that specifies the type of image and color that will be affected by the color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment matrices.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag" /> 的元素，指定將會受到彩色調整和灰階調整矩陣影響之影像和色彩的類型。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> that specifies the category for which the color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment matrices are set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 的元素，指定已設定彩色調整和灰階調整矩陣的分類。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-adjustment matrix and the grayscale-adjustment matrix for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定分類的彩色調整矩陣和灰階調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify adjustment matrices for the default category, different adjustment matrices for the bitmap category, and still different adjustment matrices for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的調整矩陣、 「 點陣圖 」 類別目錄的不同調整矩陣和畫筆分類不同的調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的調整設定預設分類的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you set the color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment matrices for the pen category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType.Pen> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%2A> method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由傳遞設定的畫筆分類的彩色調整和灰階調整矩陣<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType.Pen>至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%2A>方法，沒有預設值的調整設定將套用到畫筆。

trans-unit.target: 設定彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag.Default?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the `flags` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag.Default?displayProperty=nameWithType>如`flags`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag.Default?displayProperty=nameWithType> specifies that all colors (including grays) are adjusted by the color-adjustment matrix
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag.Default?displayProperty=nameWithType> 指定彩色調整矩陣調整的所有色彩 （包括灰色）

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle image that has all the color values set to 128, producing a rectangle that is filled with a solid medium-gray color.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形映像的所有值都設為 128，產生使用媒體灰色純色填滿的矩形的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The code then draws this rectangle image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼然後會將這個矩形影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix> and sets its <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> location to 1.75, which emphasizes the red component of the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix>並設定其<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix>1.75 強調映像的紅色元件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object and calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件並呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image (a second rectangle) to the screen using the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix> just set in the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 將映像 （第二個矩形） 繪製到螢幕使用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix>中只設定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the second rectangle has the color red emphasized.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，第二個矩形的色彩為紅色反白。

trans-unit.source: The color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An element of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag" /> that specifies the type of image and color that will be affected by the color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag" /> 的元素，指定將會受到彩色調整矩陣影響之影像和色彩的類型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `RotateColors` from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`RotateColors`從表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 設定 Gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: The gamma correction value.
trans-unit.target: Gamma 修正值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the gamma value for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定預設分類的 Gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: Typical values for the `gamma` parameter are from 1.0 to 2.2; however, values from 0.1 to 5.0 could prove useful in some circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 一般值`gamma`參數會從 1.0 2.2; 不過，從 0.1 到 5.0 的值無法證明在某些情況下很有用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定： 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的 gamma 值，不同的 gamma 值點陣圖分類，然後畫筆分類不同的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: Gamma values outside the usual range may be useful for old CRT monitors or for monitors that are in unusual lighting conditions, such as industrial environments or window displays.
trans-unit.target: 一般範圍以外的 gamma 值可能是適用於舊的 CRT 監視器或監視器的不尋常的光源的狀況，例如工業環境或視窗會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you need to change the image file path to a path and image name valid on your system.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您需要將影像檔案路徑變更為您系統上有效的路徑和映像名稱。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Opens an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that uses the file Camera.jpg and draws it to the screen using the default value for gamma.
trans-unit.target: 開啟<xref:System.Drawing.Image>，使用 「 檔案 Camera.jpg 和繪製到螢幕的 gamma 使用預設值。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object and sets its gamma to 2.2 by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetGamma%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件，並設定其 gamma 藉由呼叫 2.2<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetGamma%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image (a second camera) to the screen using the gamma value just set in the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 影像 (第二個 camera) 繪製到螢幕使用只在設定 gamma 值<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件。

trans-unit.source: The gamma correction value.
trans-unit.target: Gamma 修正值。

trans-unit.source: An element of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> enumeration that specifies the category for which the gamma value is set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType" /> 列舉的元素，指定已經設定 Gamma 值的分類。

trans-unit.source: Sets the gamma value for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定分類的 Gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: Typical values for the `gamma` parameter are from 1.0 to 2.2; however, values from 0.1 to 5.0 could prove useful in some circumstances.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.

trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由傳遞設定畫筆分類的 gamma 值<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType.Pen>至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetGamma%2A>方法，沒有預設值的調整設定將套用到畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Gamma values outside the usual range may be useful for old CRT monitors or for monitors that are in unusual lighting conditions, such as industrial environments or window displays.

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetGamma%28System.Single%29> method.
